univ_pi:
/-- The finite product of a family of sets of unique differentiability is a set of unique
differentiability. -/
theorem unique_diff_on.univ_pi (Œπ : Type _) [Finite Œπ] (E : Œπ ‚Üí Type _) [‚àÄ i, normed_add_comm_group (E i)]
    [‚àÄ i, normed_space ùïú (E i)] (s : ‚àÄ i, set (E i)) (h : ‚àÄ i, unique_diff_on ùïú (s i)) :
    unique_diff_on ùïú (Set.pi univ s) :=
  unique_diff_on.pi _ _ _ _ fun i _ => h i
#align unique_diff_on.univ_pi unique_diff_on.univ_pi

unique_diff_within_at_convex:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/-- In a real vector space, a convex set with nonempty interior is a set of unique
differentiability at every point of its closure. -/
theorem unique_diff_within_at_convex {s : set G} (conv : convex (expr‚Ñù) s) (hs : (interior s).nonempty) {x : G}
    (hx : x ‚àà closure s) : unique_diff_within_at (expr‚Ñù) s x :=
  by
  rcases hs with ‚ü®y, hy‚ü©
  suffices y - x ‚àà interior (tangent_cone_at (expr‚Ñù) s x)
    by
    refine' ‚ü®dense.of_closure _, hx‚ü©
    simp [(submodule.span (expr‚Ñù) (tangent_cone_at (expr‚Ñù) s x)).eq_top_of_nonempty_interior'
        ‚ü®y - x, interior_mono submodule.subset_span this‚ü©]
  rw [mem_interior_iff_mem_nhds]
  replace hy : interior s ‚àà (nhds) y := is_open.mem_nhds is_open_interior hy
  apply mem_of_superset ((is_open_map_sub_right x).image_mem_nhds hy)
  rintro _ ‚ü®z, zs, rfl‚ü©
  refine' mem_tangent_cone_of_open_segment_subset (subset.trans _ interior_subset)
  exact conv.open_segment_closure_interior_subset_interior hx zs
#align unique_diff_within_at_convex unique_diff_within_at_convex

    unique_diff_within_at ùïú s x ‚Üî unique_diff_within_at ùïú t x :=
  ‚ü®fun h => h.mono_nhds <| le_of_eq st, fun h => h.mono_nhds <| le_of_eq st.symm‚ü©

/-- In a real vector space, a convex set with nonempty interior is a set of unique
differentiability. -/
theorem unique_diff_on_convex {s : set G} (conv : convex (expr‚Ñù) s) (hs : (interior s).nonempty) :
    unique_diff_on (expr‚Ñù) s := fun x xs => unique_diff_within_at_convex conv hs (subset_closure xs)

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª -/
/-

-- This section is devoted to the properties of the tangent cone.
theorem tangent_cone_univ : tangent_cone_at ùïú univ x = univ :=
  by
  refine' univ_subset_iff.1 fun y hy => _
  rcases exists_one_lt_norm ùïú with ‚ü®w, hw‚ü©
  refine' ‚ü®fun n => w ^ n, fun n => ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª (w ^ n)‚Åª¬π y, univ_mem' fun n => mem_univ _, _, _‚ü©
  ¬∑ simp only [norm_pow]
    exact tendsto_pow_at_top_at_top_of_one_lt hw
  ¬∑ convert tendsto_const_nhds
    ext n
    have : w ^ n * (w ^ n)‚Åª¬π = 1 := by
      apply mul_inv_cancel
      apply pow_ne_zero
      simpa [norm_eq_zero] using (ne_of_lt (lt_trans zero_lt_one hw)).symm
    rw [smul_smul, this, one_smul]
#align tangent_cone_univ tangent_cone_univ

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within -/
theorem tangent_cone_mono_nhds (h : nhds_within s x ‚â§ nhds_within t x) :
    tangent_cone_at ùïú s x ‚äÜ tangent_cone_at ùïú t x :=
  by
  rintro y ‚ü®c, d, ds, ctop, clim‚ü©
  refine' ‚ü®c, d, _, ctop, clim‚ü©
  suffices : tendsto (fun n => x + d n) at_top (nhds_within t x)
  exact tendsto_principal.1 (tendsto_inf.1 this).2
  refine' (tendsto_inf.2 ‚ü®_, tendsto_principal.2 ds‚ü©).mono_right h
  simpa only [add_zero] using tendsto_const_nhds.add (tangent_cone_at.lim_zero at_top ctop clim)
#align tangent_cone_mono_nhds tangent_cone_mono_nhds
tangent_cone_mono:
theorem tangent_cone_mono (h : s ‚äÜ t) : tangent_cone_at ùïú s x ‚äÜ tangent_cone_at ùïú t x :=

  exact ‚ü®c, d, mem_of_superset ds fun n hn => h hn, ctop, clim‚ü©

/-- Intersecting with a neighborhood of the point does not change the tangent cone. -/
theorem tangent_cone_inter_nhds (ht : t ‚àà (nhds) x) : tangent_cone_at ùïú (s ‚à© t) x = tangent_cone_at ùïú s x :=
  tangent_cone_congr (nhds_within_restrict' _ ht).symm

tangent_cone_congr:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within -/
/-- Tangent cone of `s` at `x` depends only on `ùìù[s] x`. -/
theorem tangent_cone_congr (h : nhds_within s x = nhds_within t x) : tangent_cone_at ùïú s x = tangent_cone_at ùïú t x :=
  Subset.antisymm (tangent_cone_mono_nhds <| le_of_eq h) (tangent_cone_mono_nhds <| le_of_eq h.symm)

/-- The tangent cone of a product contains the tangent cone of its right factor. -/

    ¬´expr '' ¬ª (linear_map.inr ùïú E F) (tangent_cone_at ùïú t y) ‚äÜ tangent_cone_at ùïú (lower_set.prod s t) (x, y) :=

    by
    intro n
    rcases mem_closure_iff_nhds.1 hs _ (eventually_nhds_norm_smul_sub_lt (c n) x (pow_pos one_half_pos n)) with
      ‚ü®z, hz, hzs‚ü©
    exact ‚ü®z - x, by simpa using hzs, by simpa using hz‚ü©
  choose d' hd' using this
  refine' ‚ü®c, fun n => (d' n, d n), _, hc, _‚ü©
  show
    ¬´expr‚àÄ·∂† in , ¬ª "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚àÄ·∂† in , ¬ª" at_top

  ¬∑ apply tendsto.prod_mk_nhds _ hy

    exact tendsto_pow_at_top_nhds_0_of_lt_1 one_half_pos.le one_half_lt_one

/-- The product of two sets of unique differentiability is a set of unique differentiability. -/

    unique_diff_on ùïú (lower_set.prod s t) := fun ‚ü®x, y‚ü© h => unique_diff_within_at.prod (hs x h.1) (ht y h.2)

/-- The finite product of a family of sets of unique differentiability is a set of unique
differentiability. -/
theorem unique_diff_on.pi (Œπ : Type _) [Finite Œπ] (E : Œπ ‚Üí Type _) [‚àÄ i, normed_add_comm_group (E i)]

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/

/-- If a subset of a real vector space contains a segment, then the direction of this
segment belongs to the tangent cone at its endpoints. -/
theorem mem_tangent_cone_of_segment_subset {s : set G} {x y : G} (h : segment (expr‚Ñù) x y ‚äÜ s) :
    y - x ‚àà tangent_cone_at (expr‚Ñù) s x :=
  mem_tangent_cone_of_open_segment_subset ((open_segment_subset_segment (expr‚Ñù) x y).trans h)
#align mem_tangent_cone_of_segment_subset mem_tangent_cone_of_segment_subset
mem_tangent_cone_of_open_segment_subset:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expr‚Ñù -/
/-- If a subset of a real vector space contains an open segment, then the direction of this
segment belongs to the tangent cone at its endpoints. -/
theorem mem_tangent_cone_of_open_segment_subset {s : set G} {x y : G} (h : open_segment (expr‚Ñù) x y ‚äÜ s) :
    y - x ‚àà tangent_cone_at (expr‚Ñù) s x :=
  by
  let c := fun n : ‚Ñï => (2 : expr‚Ñù) ^ (n + 1)
  let d := fun n : ‚Ñï => ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª (c n)‚Åª¬π (y - x)
  refine' ‚ü®c, d, filter.univ_mem' fun n => h _, _, _‚ü©
  show x + d n ‚àà open_segment (expr‚Ñù) x y
  ¬∑ rw [open_segment_eq_image]
    refine' ‚ü®(c n)‚Åª¬π, ‚ü®_, _‚ü©, _‚ü©
    ¬∑ rw [inv_pos]
      apply pow_pos
      norm_num
    ¬∑ apply inv_lt_one
      apply one_lt_pow _ (nat.succ_ne_zero _)
      norm_num
    ¬∑ simp only [d, sub_smul, smul_sub, one_smul]
      abel
  show filter.tendsto (fun n : ‚Ñï => ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª (c n)) filter.at_top filter.at_top
  ¬∑ have : (fun n : ‚Ñï => ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª (c n)) = c := by
      ext n
      exact abs_of_nonneg (pow_nonneg (by norm_num) _)
    rw [this]
    exact (tendsto_pow_at_top_at_top_of_one_lt (by norm_num)).comp (tendsto_add_at_top_nat 1)
  show filter.tendsto (fun n : ‚Ñï => ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª (c n) (d n)) filter.at_top ((nhds) (y - x))
  ¬∑ have : (fun n : ‚Ñï => ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª (c n) (d n)) = fun n => y - x :=
      by
      ext n
      simp only [d, smul_smul]
      rw [mul_inv_cancel, one_smul]
      exact pow_ne_zero _ (by norm_num)
    rw [this]
    apply tendsto_const_nhds

/-- The tangent cone of a product contains the tangent cone of each factor. -/
theorem maps_to_tangent_cone_pi {Œπ : Type _} [decidable_eq Œπ] {E : Œπ ‚Üí Type _} [‚àÄ i, normed_add_comm_group (E i)]
    [‚àÄ i, normed_space ùïú (E i)] {s : ‚àÄ i, set (E i)} {x : ‚àÄ i, E i} {i : Œπ}
    (hi : ‚àÄ (j) (_ : j ‚â† i), x j ‚àà closure (s j)) :
    MapsTo (linear_map.single i : ¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çó[ ] ¬ª (E i) ùïú (‚àÄ j, E j)) (tangent_cone_at ùïú (s i) (x i))

  rintro w ‚ü®c, d, hd, hc, hy‚ü©

      ‚ü®z, hz, hzs‚ü©

  choose! d' hd's hcd'
  refine' ‚ü®c, fun n => function.update (d' n) i (d n), hd.mono fun n hn j hj' => _, hc, tendsto_pi_nhds.2 fun j => _‚ü©
  ¬∑ rcases em (j = i) with (rfl | hj) <;> simp [*]
  ¬∑ rcases em (j = i) with (rfl | hj)
    ¬∑ simp [hy]
    ¬∑ suffices tendsto (fun n => ¬´expr ‚Ä¢ ¬ª (c n) (d' n j)) at_top ((nhds) 0) by simpa [hj]
      refine' squeeze_zero_norm (fun n => (hcd' n j hj).le) _
      exact tendsto_pow_at_top_nhds_0_of_lt_1 one_half_pos.le one_half_lt_one

theorem tangent_cone_at.lim_zero {Œ± : Type _} (l : filter Œ±) {c : Œ± ‚Üí ùïú} {d : Œ± ‚Üí E}
